name: echoic-space
description: Website: Diego Villaseñor, músico, compositor, programador

scripts.build: . ./ensure_java_version.sh && npm run build:content && npm run build:sass && npm run ssr && npm run release:browser
scripts.prefix-css: postcss --use autoprefixer cssnano -b 'last 5 versions' build/browser/css/mazorca.css -o build/browser/css/mazorca.css
scripts.build:sass: sass src/sass/mazorca.scss build/browser/css/mazorca.css && npm run prefix-css
